L’objectif du centre As Tam Academy est,: The aim of the As Tam Academy center is not only to give children a taste for soccer, but also to help them improve their football skills, while instilling in them the values that make the club so strong.
As Tam Academy Bénin propose des stages: As Tam Academy Benin offers soccer clinics and soccer schools in training centers.
Les objectifs positifs axés sur le plais: Positive, pleasure-based goals are far more powerful motivators than negative, fear-based ones. Although each succeeds separately, the right combination of the two is the most powerful motivating force known to mankind.
Donnez-vous le pouvoir de la responsabil: Do you have the power of responsibility. Remember that the only thing stopping you is yourself.
Pour ceux d’entre vous qui veulent vraim: For those of you who truly want to have more, do more, give more and be more, success is achievable with some understanding of what needs to be done, some discipline around planning and executing those plans and the belief that you can achieve your desires.

Mettez les rames dans l’eau et commencez: Put the oars in the water and start rowing. Execution is the most important factor for success, the sooner you reach your goals!
Nous nous définissons en trois mots: We define ourselves in three words

Parallèlement à vos plans, vous devriez: Alongside your plans, you should consider developing an action orientation that will keep you motivated to move forward at all times. This requires a little self-discipline, but is a crucial element of any success.
L’Académie Sportive Tadagbe Ahoton Moise: The Académie Sportive Tadagbe Ahoton Moise (AS-TAM), offers a soccer experience centered on pleasure and passion in a respectful and fair environment practiced in conditions conducive to success for all types of players of all aspirations
